content.query:
SELECT TOP 100
       [nyc].*,
       [nyc].filename() as file_name1,
       [nyc].filepath(1) as file_year,
       [nyc].filepath(2) as file_month
FROM  
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_tax_src',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) as nyc
